DOC.brief_summary: Incretin hormone ( GLP-1 GIP ) release intestine response meal ingestion augment insulin secretion pancreas help maintain glycemic control . Studies vitro vivo show incretin hormone also functional effect tissue independent insulin secretory response . Both GLP-1 GIP stimulate insulin secretion glucose-dependent manner , however glucose-dependency extra-pancreatic effect examine vivo . By use pancreatic clamp methodology euglycemic hyperglycemic condition test hypothesis extra-pancreatic effect GLP-1 GIP glucose-dependent .
DOC.criteria: age 1860 year BMI 1830 kg/m2 Male Normal glycemic control ( fast glucose < 5.6 mM ) Evidence chronic disease Smoking Active weight loss ( > 2 kg previous 6 month ) Treatment drug know affect outcome varaibles
